subject: Re: [junit] Re: German book on Junit and test first ready for review
msgSnippet: ... You have the Extreme Programming serie and also a book due in november: Extreme Programming in Java : With Xp Tools Including Ant, Junit, and Jmeter (not
messageBody:

You have the Extreme Programming serie and also a book due in november:
"Extreme Programming in Java : With Xp Tools Including Ant, Junit, and
Jmeter" (not yet published) - I just made a quick search on Amazon.
Don't know if these books are really worth reading.

-Vladimir
